/** permutaion: æ’åˆ—ã€‚
* ä»nä¸ªæ•°ä¸­é€‰å‡ºmä¸ªæ•°çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œè‹¥ä¸è€ƒè™‘é¡ºåºCn(m)ï¼Œè‹¥è€ƒè™‘é¡ºåºAn(m)
*/

/* é—®é¢˜ï¼šå¯†ç æ’åˆ—
* å‡è®¾æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª 4 ä½å­—æ¯å¯†ç ï¼Œæ¯ä½å¯†ç æ˜¯ aï½e ä¹‹é—´çš„å°å†™å­—ã€‚
* ç¼–å†™å¯†ç å¯èƒ½æ’åˆ—æ–¹å¼ã€‚
*/
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

class Permutation {
private:
int resultCount_ = 0;

public:
/** Details: æ ¹æ®è¾“å…¥å­—æ¯åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œè·å¾—æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ’åˆ—æ–¹å¼ã€‚
* params: result- å½“å‰æ’åˆ—å½¢å¼ï¼Œ candidate- æœªæ’åˆ—å­—æ¯è¡¨ã€‚
* return: null
*/
void breakPassword(vector<string> result, vector<string> candidate) {
int len = candidate.size();
if (0 == len) {
// æ— å­—æ¯å‰©ä½™ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºæ’åˆ—ç»“æœ
outputResult(result);
resultCount_++;
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
vector<string> resultNew;
vector<string> candidateLeft;
// è¯»å–æ’åˆ—å­—æ¯
resultNew = result;
resultNew.push_back(candidate[i]);
// è·å¾—å‰©ä½™å­—æ¯è¡¨
candidateLeft = candidate;
vector<string>::iterator it = candidateLeft.begin();
candidateLeft.erase(it + i);
// é€’å½’
breakPassword(resultNew, candidateLeft);
}
}
// è¾“å‡ºç»“æœ
void outputResult(vector<string> result) {
for (unsigned int i = 0; i < result.size(); i++) {
cout << result[i];
}
cout << endl;
}
// è·å¾—æ‰€æœ‰å¯èƒ½å¯†ç æ€»æ•°
int getResultCount() {
return resultCount_;
}
};

int main(void) {
vector<string> fourAlphabetString = {"a", "b", "c", "d", "e"};
vector<string> res;
Permutation test;
test.breakPassword(res, fourAlphabetString);
cout << "å¯èƒ½çš„å¯†ç å½¢å¼ï¼š";
cout << test.getResultCount() << "ç§" << endl;
}

private static char[] _letters = { 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e' };
public static void GetPassword()
{
string password = "abded";
CrackPassword(password.Length, new StringBuilder(), password);
}

private static void CrackPassword(int length, StringBuilder result, string realPsd)
{
if (length == 0)
{
if (realPsd.Equals(result.ToString()))
{
Console.WriteLine("Your password is:" + result.ToString());
}
result.Length = 0;
return;
}
else if (length < 0)
{
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < _letters.Length; i++)
{
StringBuilder temp = new StringBuilder();
temp.Append(result.ToString());
temp.Append(_letters[i]);
CrackPassword(length - 1, temp, realPsd);
}
}

void BreakPassword( string Words, int PasswordLen, string result)
{
if (result.length() == PasswordLen)
{
//C++ä¸­stringç±»å‹ä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥è¾“å‡ºï¼Œéœ€åŠ å¤´é—®é¢˜#include<string>ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ç”¨#include<string.h>

}
}

public class Crack {
static char[] pwdcs = new char[] { 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e' };
static String[] crack(int len) {
String[] ps = new String[] { "" };
while (len-- > 0) {
String[] nps = new String[ps.length * pwdcs.length];
int nsbsi = 0;
for (String pwd : ps) {
for (char c : pwdcs) {
nps[nsbsi++] = pwd + c;
}
}
ps = nps;
}
return ps;
}


public static void main(String[] args) {
String[] pwds = crack(4);
for (String pwd : pwds) {
System.out.println(pwd);
}

void generator(int len,const string& passItems,string prePass,vector<string>& passSet){
if(len==0){
passSet.push_back(prePass);
return;
}
for(int i=0;i<passItems.size();++i){
generator(len-1,passItems,prePass+passItems[i],passSet);
}
}

public class PasswordCracker {
private List<String> allCombination;
private String[] pwElementPool;
private int pwDigits;

private PasswordCracker(String[] pwElementPool, int pwDigits) {
allCombination = Lists.newArrayListWithExpectedSize(pwElementPool.length ^ pwDigits);
this.pwElementPool = pwElementPool;
this.pwDigits = pwDigits;
}

public void fillAllCombination(String aCombination) {
if (aCombination.length() == pwDigits) {
allCombination.add(aCombination);
return;
}
for (String element : pwElementPool) {
fillAllCombination(aCombination + element);
}

}

public static List<String> getAllCombination(String[] pwElementPool, int pwDigits) {
PasswordCracker passwordCracker = new PasswordCracker(pwElementPool, pwDigits);
passwordCracker.fillAllCombination("");
return passwordCracker.allCombination;
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
int pwDigits = 4;
String[] pwElementPool = {"a", "b", "c", "d", "e"};
List<String> allCombination = getAllCombination(pwElementPool, pwDigits);
System.out.println(String.format("å…±ç”Ÿæˆäº†%sç§å¯†ç ", allCombination.size()));
for (String aCombination : allCombination) {
System.out.println(aCombination);
}
}
}

*res = append(*res, strings.Join(s, ""))

}

}
}

*res = append(*res, strings.Join(s, ""))

void permutationRecursive(QStringList restData, QStringList resultData){
if(restData.isEmpty())
{
qDebug()<<resultData;
return;
}

for(int i=0; i<restData.length(); i++){
QStringList newResultData = resultData;
newResultData.append(restData[i]);

QStringList newRestData = restData;
newRestData.removeAt(i);

permutationRecursive(newRestData, newResultData);
}
}

void permutationIteration(QStringList list){
QList<QStringList> result, tmp;

result<<QStringList(list[0]);
for(int j=1; j<list.count(); j++){
for(int k=0; k<result.count(); k++){
for(int m=0; m<result[k].count()+1; m++){
QStringList aa = result[k];
aa.insert(m, list[j]);
tmp<<aa;
}
}
result = tmp;
tmp.clear();
}
for(int i= 0; i < result.count(); i++){
qDebug()<<result[i];
}
}

void repeatPermutationRecursive(QStringList list, QStringList result){
if(list.count() == result.count()){
qDebug()<<result;
return;
}
for(int i=0; i<list.count(); i++){
QStringList resultCopy = result;
resultCopy<<list[i];
repeatPermutationRecursive(list, resultCopy);
}
}

void repeatPermutationIteration(QStringList list){
QList<QStringList> result, resultTmp;

if(list.count() == 0)
return;

for(int i=0; i<list.count(); i++){
result<<QStringList(list[i]);
}
for(int i=1; i<list.count(); i++){
for(int j=0; j<list.count(); j++){
for(int k = 0; k<result.count(); k++){
QStringList tmp = result[k];
tmp.append(list[j]);
resultTmp.append(tmp);
}
}
result = resultTmp;
resultTmp.clear();
}
for(int i= 0; i < result.count(); i++){
qDebug()<<result[i];
}
}

public static List<List<string>> GenAllPermutations(List<string> members)
{
var allPerms = new List<List<string>>();
if (members.Count <= 1)
{
allPerms.Add(new List<string>(members));
return allPerms;
}

for (int i = 0; i < members.Count; i++)
{
var members2 = new List<string>(members);
string first = members2[i];
members2.RemoveAt(i);

var allPerms2 = GenAllPermutations(members2);
foreach (var perm2 in allPerms2)
{
var perm = new List<string> {first};
perm.AddRange(perm2);
allPerms.Add(perm);
}
}

return allPerms;
}

var Lower = lowercase("e")

func lowercase(end string) []string {
rst := []string{}
stop := int([]rune(end)[0])
for i := 97; i <= stop; i++ {

}
return rst

func brute(bit int, rst []string) {
if bit == 0 {

return
} else {
for _, v := range Lower {

copy(newRst, rst)
newRst = append(newRst, v)
brute(bit-1, newRst)
}

}

}

/**

* user password
* @param lists
* (a~e) password value range
* @param sb
* current crack password

public static void crack(String password, ArrayList<String> lists, StringBuilder sb) {

if (sb.length() == password.length()) {
if (sb.toString().equals(password)) {
System.out.println(String.format("original passwordï¼š %s , crack passwordï¼š%s , succeedï¼", password, sb.toString()));
System.exit(0); // succeedï¼Œforce exit
}
System.out.println(String.format("password matching failedï¼š %s", sb.toString()));
return; // crack failed ,continue
}

for (int i = 0; i < lists.size(); i++) {
StringBuilder sBuilder = new StringBuilder(sb.toString()); // copy and keep old state
sBuilder.append(lists.get(i));
crack(password, lists, sBuilder);
}
}

}

#include <stdio.h>

//è®°å½•é¡¹çš„å®šä¹‰
typedef struct record_type {
int data;
} RecordType;

#define MAX_NBR 100


static void visit(RecordType r[], int s[], int n)
{
int i;

for (i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)
printf("%d, ", r[s[i]].data);
printf("%d\n", r[s[i]].data);
}


// s å’Œ rest æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå­˜çš„æ˜¯ç´¢å¼•
void recursion(RecordType r[], int s[], int n, int rest[], int m)
{
if (m > 0)
{
int i, j;
int rest2[MAX_NBR];

for (i = 0; i < m; i++)
{
s[n] = rest[i];
for (j = 0; j < i; j++)
rest2[j] = rest[j];
for (j = i; j < m-1; j++)
rest2[j] = rest[j+1];

recursion(r, s, n + 1, rest2, m - 1);
}
}
else
{
visit(r, s, n);
}
}

void permutation(RecordType r[], int len)
{
int n, m;
int s[MAX_NBR], rest[MAX_NBR];

n = 0;
m = len;
for (int i = 0; i < len; i++)
rest[i] = i;

recursion(r, s, n, rest, m);
}


int main(void)
{
int data[5] = { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 };
RecordType r[5];

for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
r[i].data = data[i];

permutation(r, 5);
}

type compareFunc = func(src string) bool

compare := createCompare(*inputPw)

}

func getPassword(compare compareFunc, maxLength int) (string, bool) {
for length := 1; length <= maxLength; length++ {
kindsFloat := math.Pow(float64(len(pwSet)), float64(length))
kinds := int(kindsFloat)
base := len(pwSet)
for kind := 0; kind < kinds; kind++ {
//10è¿›åˆ¶è½¬ä¸ºpwSet.lengthçš„è¿›åˆ¶
numStr := strconv.FormatInt(int64(kind), base)
var srcPw = ""
for _, indexStr := range []byte(numStr) {
index, ok := strconv.ParseInt(string(indexStr), base, 64)
if ok == nil {
srcPw = pwSet[index] + srcPw
}
}
if compare(srcPw) == true {
return srcPw, true
}
}
}

return "æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æ­£ç¡®å¯†ç ", false
}

///è¿”å›æ¯”è¾ƒå‡½æ•°
func createCompare(target string) compareFunc {
return func(src string) bool {
return strings.Compare(target, src) == 0
}
}

#include <memory.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>

#define PASSWD "eeee"
#define PASSLEN 4

/* return cnt(>1) if cracked */
double crack(char *str, int len, char start, char end)
{
int i = 0;
double limit, cnt = 0;

limit = pow(end - start + 1, len); /* iter limit */
while (cnt++ <= limit) {
if (!memcmp(str, PASSWD, len)) return cnt; /* found! */

str[0]++;
/* å¾ªç¯é€’åŠ å­—æ¯ï¼Œè¶…è¿‡èŒƒå›´åˆ™è¿›ä½ */
for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
if (str[i] <= end) {
break; /* æ— éœ€ç»§ç»­è¿›ä½ */
}
if (i == (len - 1)) {
return 0; /* æœ€é«˜ä½è¿›ä½ï¼Œè¡¨æ˜æ²¡æ‰¾åˆ° */
}

str[i] = start; /* å¾ªç¯è¿›ä½é€’åŠ å­—æ¯ */
str[i+1]++;
}
}
return 0;
}

int main(void)
{
char buf[PASSLEN+1] = "aaaa";
double cnt;

if ((cnt = crack(buf, PASSLEN, 'a', 'e')) > 0) {
printf("success! key is [%s], cnt=%.0f\n", buf, cnt);
} else {
printf("fail..\n");
}

return 1;
}

@Getter
@Setter
class Permutation {

// æ’åˆ—è¯
private List<Character> words;

// é•¿åº¦
private int length;

public List<ArrayList<Character>> getRepeatedFullyPermutation() {
List<ArrayList<Character>> result = words.stream().map(character -> {
ArrayList<Character> res = new ArrayList<>();
res.add(character);
return res;
}).collect(Collectors.toList());

for (int i = 1; i < length; i++) {
List<ArrayList<Character>> newResult = new ArrayList<>();
result.forEach(j -> words.forEach(
character -> {
ArrayList<Character> res = (ArrayList<Character>) j.clone();
res.add(character);
newResult.add(res);
}
)
);
result = newResult;
}

return result;
}
}

}
}
}
